Title: Recession Fears Escalate as Economists Identify Warning Signs: 'Will Materialize as Early as July'
Summary: Wall Street is increasingly concerned about a potential recession, as economists identify several indicators suggesting an impending economic downturn, including rising inflation, increased debt load, struggling small- and mid-cap stocks, and declining corporate earnings guidance.

Title: ROSEN, NATIONAL TRIAL COUNSEL, Encourages Target Corporation Investors to Secure Counsel Before Important Deadline in Securities Class Action â€“ TGT
Summary: A class action lawsuit has been filed against Target Corporation (NYSE: TGT) for allegedly making false and misleading statements about its Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) and Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) mandates, which led to customer boycotts and a decline in the company's stock price.
